tooltip.displayText: Kids Favourites Filter applied. Remove this filter to see the full Menu.

info.name: Ghee Pudi Masala Dosa
info.description: Crispy on the outside and soft and fluffy on the inside, our ghee pudi masala dosas are roasted to perfection in pure nandini ghee. We serve this with a combination of chutney pudi and aloo palya on the inside and 2 types of chutneys and our signature drumstick sambar.

info.name: Open Butter Masala Dosa
info.description:
This fluffy ghee-roasted dosa is accompanied
with our melt-in-your-mouth aloo palya and a dollop of butter on top. Garnished
with fresh cilantro, coconut and carrots shavings, each bite delivers flavours that
are guaranteed to satisfy your dosa cravings any time of the day or night.

info.name: Ghee Onion Dosa( 2 Pcs)
info.description: Ghee onion dosa, this fluffy dosa is topped with caramelized chopped onions that provide a satisfying crunch with every bite. This dosa is served with coconut & tomato chutney along with our signature drumstick sambar.

info.name: Ghee Plain Dosa
info.description: Crispy dosa made in pure nandini ghee served with 2 types of chutney and our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee Masala Dosa
info.description: Crispy masala dosa made in pure nandini ghee and served with aloo palya, 2 types of chutney and our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee Saagu Dosa
info.description: Crispy dosa with vegetable saagu on the inside made in pure nandini ghee served with 2 types of chutney and our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee Khali Dosa (2 Pcs)
info.description:
Serves 1
khali dosa comes with 2 types of chutney and saagu

info.description: Fluffy set dosas served with 2 types of chutney and saagu

info.name: Ghee Garlic Roast Dosa
info.description: Crispy garlic roast made in pure nandini ghee and served with 2 types of chutney & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee Garlic Masala Dosa
info.description: Appetizing dosa made in nandini ghee anda generous portion of garic masala is served with 2 types of chutney & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee Pudi Thatte Idli (1)
info.description: Melt in the mouth idli topped with pudi and drenched in nandini ghee served with 2 chutneys & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Mini Vada (2 Pcs)
info.description: Deep fired golden brown crispy dish. Can be savored on its own or as an accompaniment served with 2 types of chutneys & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee / Butter Thatte Idli
info.description: Melt in the mouth rice idli drenched in nandini ghee / butter served with 2 types of chutney & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee / Butter Ragi Thatte Idli
info.description: Melt in the mouth finger millet idli drenched in nandini ghee / butter served with 2 types of chutney & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Thatte Idli(1)
info.description: Melt in the mouth rice idli, a classic dish without any garnishing served with 2 types of chutney and our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Ghee Button Idli Sambar
info.description: Button idlis, the best on the go breakfast. Soft button idlis soaked in our signature drumstick sambar and topped with nandini ghee.

info.name: Ghee Ven Pongal
info.description: Light and comforting meal made of rice, yellow moong dal & ghee. Served with 2 types of chutney & our signature drumstick sambar

info.name: Poori Saagu (3 Pcs)
info.description: Deep fried puffy pooris and saagu made of vegetable, spices & cashew served with 2 types of chutney & our signature drumstick sambar

info.description: Jain masala dosa is served with jain chutney, jain payla and jain sambar

info.name: Kesaribath
info.description:
Server 1
a classic dish where kesari refers to the spice saffron which creates the dish's colour.

info.name: Kharabath
info.description:
Serves 1
a mildly spiced rava upma a very popular dish served with coconut chutney

info.name: Gulab Jamoon (1)
info.description:
Serves 1
all time favorite Indian dessert

info.name: Ghee Pudi Kharabath
info.description: A mildly spiced rava upma a very popular dish topped with pudi and  nandini ghee served with coconut chutney

info.name: Sweet Pongal
info.description:
Serves 1
a delicious south indian dish made with rice, moong lentils, ghee, jaggery, cardamoms and nuts.

info.name: Baalekai (banana) Bajji (4 Pcs)
info.description: Raw banana, gram flour and spices make for favorite evening time snack

info.name: Masala Vada (4 Pcs)
info.description: Masala means a mixture of spices and vada is a fried lentil snack. So masala vada translates to a fried snack made with lentils and spices

info.name: Chilli Bajji (4 Pcs)
info.description: Chilli bajji is a popular south indian street fried snack made with gram flour, spices and green chilies.

info.name: Vegetable Shavige Bath
info.description: It is a common breakfast recipe made across south indian states. Typically served without any accompaniment but tastes great when served with chutneys.
